name: WILSOOOON
description:
WILSOOOON WILL KEEP YOU COMPANY IN CORONAVIRUS SOCIAL DISTANCING TO PREVENT YOU FROM GOING UTTERLY INSANE!

PRESSING ESC WILL KILL WILSOOOON, BUT DO NOT KILL WILSOOOON HE WILL SAVE YOU FROM INSANITY!

ALSO, WILSOOOON BELIEVES IT CAN FLY! JUST THROW IT AROUND FOR REDUCED INSANITY!

If pressing ESC does not kill WILSOOOON, click WILSOOOON then press ESC. If it still doesn't kill it, tell me because it's supposed to be dead.

Download my cool game CodeStory! It is a self-conscious Universe!
